login.title: SSItizens Portal
login.subtitle: Here you can access your personalized dashboard, view and manage your tokens.

admin.subtitleAdmin: Access for the system administrator of tokens for citizens and stores.

ssitizens.subtitleSsitizens: Citizen access allows you to view all your data and privacy policies.

citizensAdminDashboard.welcomeSubtitle: A new way to pay at your favorite stores
citizensAdminDashboard.manualDescription: Make purchases by scanning your receipt to pay with your assigned tokens. The store staff will always assist you with the operation. Just like real money!
citizensAdminDashboard.historyDescription: In the 'history' section you can review your operations, expenses, and which store they were made in
citizensAdminDashboard.privacyDescription: Your information is very important to us. Please read and authorize the privacy policies

citizensDashboard.addCommerceDescription: Add new stores to the SSItizens service
citizensDashboard.toastSubtitle: Your funds request has been submitted successfully

commerceModal.message: When creating the new registration, the person in charge will receive an e-mail with the SSItizens registration notice.

accountDeactivationModal.description: The administrator will be notified and the deactivation process will begin.

fundsConfirmationModal.title: Funds requested
fundsConfirmationModal.notify: When the funds are available, you will receive a notification in the system.
fundsConfirmationModal.autoLoad: If approved, the amount will be automatically loaded into the city council account.

addGasModal.addGasInfo: When adding more funds, the request will be sent and these will become gas to pay for transactions.
addGasModal.notify: When the funds are available, you will receive a notification in the system.
addGasModal.errorAmount: The amount must be greater than 0

commerceDashboard.welcomeSubtitle: A new way to charge your favorite customers
commerceDashboard.bankAccountDescription: Add or change your bank account in seconds. This action is required to operate.
commerceDashboard.bankAccountAddedDescription: Your bank account has been registered successfully.
commerceDashboard.historyDescription: In the "history" section you can review your operations and payments received
commerceDashboard.privacyDescription: Please read and accept our privacy policy to continue using SSItizens.
privacyPolicy: 1. Data Collection: SSItizens collects personal data such as name, email, phone, and transaction data for proper platform management.
2. Use of Information: Data is used exclusively for the administration of social aid, user and business management, and legal compliance.
3. Data Sharing: We do not share your data with third parties, except by legal obligation or explicit consent.
4. Security: We apply technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access.
5. Rights: You can access, rectify, or delete your data by contacting SSItizens support.
6. Retention: Your data will be kept as long as you are an active user or until you request its deletion.
7. Policy Changes: We will notify you of any relevant changes to this privacy policy.

userManual.title: User manual
userManual.section1Text1: SSItizens is a digital platform that allows citizens to manage social aid and make payments at participating stores easily and securely.
userManual.section1Text2: With your account you can check your balance, view your transactions, recharge funds, and accept privacy policies to operate with full transparency.
userManual.section2Text1: To recharge your balance, click the 'Recharge balance' button and follow the instructions. The administrator can assign you funds according to your aid type.
userManual.section2Text2: You will receive a notification when the funds are available in your account.
userManual.section3Text1: In the 'History' section you can review all your transactions, see where you made payments, and the details of each operation.
userManual.section4Text1: SSItizens protects your personal data and only uses it for the management of aid and payments. You can review and accept the privacy policy from your profile.
userManual.section4Text2: If you have questions, contact system support to exercise your rights of access, rectification, or deletion of data.

privacyToast.successDescription: You have accepted the privacy policy and accessed successfully.
privacyToast.errorDescription: Could not update acceptance of terms.
privacyToast.rejectDescription: You must accept the privacy policy to continue.

toastCommerce.errorBlockDescription: Could not execute force Withdrawal for the store.
toastCommerce.blockedDescription: The store's balance was successfully withdrawn.
toastCommerce.errorGeneral: Could not create the store. Please check the data.

accountDeactivation.title: Account Deactivation
accountDeactivation.heading: Do you want to deactivate your account?
accountDeactivation.description: When requesting deactivation, a notification will be sent to the administrator to process your request. They may call you to confirm and understand your reasons for deactivation to help improve the system.

toast.title: Request Sent
toast.description: Your deactivation request has been sent successfully.
